contained all my source. However I get an error message saying my project does

I know this used to work in 2.1

I would really appreciate if this was fixed ASAP otherwise I might have to
revert back to 2.1.1 release.

This looks like a duplicate of bug 40322. It has been fixed in the latest
integration build (0723). Please try it and let us know if this fixed your problem.

I would really appreciate that you let us know if your problem has already been
fixed in the integration build I mentionned.
Thanks.

Close as duplicate of bug 40322.
